name: Beat Or Die The MiniGames
description:
in Beat Or Die the Minigames You Can:

  • Destroy
    You can destroy everything you want.
    If you want you can destroy a house.
    Walls, windows, TV, table, chairs, toilet... All!
  • Drive and Race
    You can get in the car
    And racing or freeride with friends.
  • Fight
    You can pick up the gun or sword
    And shooting with friends or swords fighting with AI enemy!
    Or if it isn't enough for you then you can fun with fan, spikes and hammers in the Sandbox map.

Game Has A 4 Players Split-screen Mode.

in there are Different Maps:

  • Sandbox
  • Modern House
  • The Road
  • The Lake
  • The Stairs
If you want to play on Split-Screen Mode you have to click on (Xbox One) controller "Start" button.
